  • Content: 
    .product-certifications {
    padding: px-to-rem(32px) 0 px-to-rem(8px) $gutter-sm;

    h2 {
        text-align: center;
        padding-right: $gutter-sm;
    }

    ul {
        @include remove-list();
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: center;
    }

    li {
        width: calc(50% - #{$gutter-sm});
        max-width: px-to-rem(135px);
        text-align: center;
        margin-right: $gutter-sm;
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(24px);
    }

    img {
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(8px);
    }

    span {
        display: block;
        font-size: px-to-rem(13px);
        line-height: 1.38;
        text-align: center;
        color: $zuccini;
        min-height: px-to-rem(38px);
        width: 100%;
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-xxs) {
        li {
            width: calc(33.33% - #{$gutter-sm});
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-s) {
        li {
            width: calc(25% - #{$gutter-sm});
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ms) {
        li {
            width: calc(20% - #{$gutter-sm});
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-m) {
        li {
            width: calc(16.66% - #{$gutter-sm});
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ml) {
        padding: px-to-rem(32px) $gutter-xl 0 $gutter-xl;

        ul {
            margin-right: -$gutter-xl;
        }

        li {
            width: calc(14.285% - #{$gutter-xl});
            margin-right: $gutter-xl;
            margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-lg) {
        li {
            width: calc(12.5% - #{$gutter-xl});
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-xl) {
        li {
            width: calc(11.11% - #{$gutter-xl});
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-xxxl) {
        padding: px-to-rem(32px) px-to-rem(176px) 0 px-to-rem(176px);
    }
}

Accessibility

The alt text is empty because it already has an adjacent text alternative. Screen readers will skip the image and not read the image name because there is an empty alt attribute, which will reduce cognitive load for those users.
